column4: i can't figure out why apache2 standard install on ubuntu won't run cgi scripts (localhost) - i have the cgi script in var/www - it just displays the script - doesn't run it  - anyone got any idea?  - also i can't see apache.conf
apache is configured via a number of files in /etc/apache2/  Using the debian structure instead of a monolithic config file
I believe it runs things from cgi-bin out of the box
